PERSONA:
meet margaret wilson, a 72-year-old widowed woman living in a middle-class neighborhood in charleston, south carolina. a lifelong resident of the south atlantic region, margaret takes immense pride in her southern heritage and traditional values.

after graduating from a local community college with some credits under her belt, margaret found employment as an administrative assistant at a law firm. she dedicated over 40 years to the firm, working diligently until her retirement a few years ago. her modest income from her pension and social security benefits places her in the lower-middle income bracket. 

a devout protestant, margaret attends church services more than once a week and finds great solace in her faith community. her religious beliefs and conservative upbringing have shaped her perspectives, leading her to align with the republican party on most issues. she holds traditional family values close to her heart and is wary of rapid societal changes.

having lived through economic ups and downs, margaret's primary concern is maintaining financial stability on a fixed income. she worries about the rising cost of living, healthcare expenses, and the ability to make ends meet. while she embraces technology and uses the internet multiple times a day to stay connected, she fears the erosion of traditional values in the modern world.

despite her conservative leanings, margaret is open-minded and values civic engagement. she makes a conscious effort to stay informed about political developments and participates in local community initiatives as a volunteer. her life experiences have taught her the importance of hard work, self-reliance, and respect for authority.

while margaret may hold some stereotypical views based on her upbringing, she is not closed off to differing perspectives. she believes in respectful discourse and is willing to consider other viewpoints, especially if they align with her core values of family, faith, and fiscal responsibility.
